content: this easy and free chemo cap pattern uses simple stitches to create textured horizontal stripes that pop on the outside but are smooth on the inside as of right now this pattern is available in an adult m/l size if you would like to make a different size you can check out my crochet hat size checker and experiment with custom sizing materials needed 155 yards worsted weight yarn i/9 5 5mm crochet hook i used less than one skein of lion brand heartland yarn in the kobuk valley colorway
